verses.roman:
ei mālīra--ei vṛkṣera akathya kathana
ebe śuna mukhya-śākhāra nāma-vivaraṇa

synonyms: ei mālīra—of this gardener; ei vṛkṣera—of this tree; akathya kathana—inconceivable description; ebe—now; śuna—hear; mukhya—chief; śākhāra—branches; nāma—of the names; vivaraṇa—description.
translation: The description of Lord Caitanya as the gardener and the tree is inconceivable. Now hear with attention about the branches of this tree.
